name: Le dîner de cons
storyline: All wednesday night, Pierre Brochant organise a 'Dîner de cons' (a shithead dinner). Goal: Bring a shithead man with a particular passion. That night François Pignon, the 'Con' is here but Pierre is not fine, more over his wife can't stand him. François Pignon will made lot of bullshit all the night, but correct them after all.
